    • addPlayer

      public ITurnManagerBuilder addPlayer(IPlayer player)
      Description copied from interface: ITurnManagerBuilder
      Add a player to the list of players. The players are added in order of call: i.e. addPlayer(p1); addPlayer(p3); addPlayer(p2); results in the following players order: p1 -> p3 -> p2.
      Specified by:
      addPlayer in interface ITurnManagerBuilder
      Parameters:
      player - player to add.
      Returns:
      the builder instance.
